content:
Note that we plan to have a connectathon track at the upcoming May workgroup meeting in Toronto, Canada. It will start to explore how to capture the mappings during development, review, and publication. Those who plan to participate and have potential suggestions for clarifying the track, please make those suggestions here, or for the appropriate section here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2019-05+v2-to-FHIR+Tooling+Track.

Note that the track will start Saturday after the official lunch break and go through Sunday.
Yes. (They're only 300 miles apart, so it's easy to confuse them ;>)
